did.unittitle: New York, New Haven & Hartford Railroad Bridge Capacity Lists Collection.
did.abstract: This collection has not yet been organized for unassisted research use. Researchers wishing to access this collection must make prior arrangements with the Curator before visiting Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center. Tables representing trackage along the New York, New Haven & Hartford Railroad with information on bridges along the route, showing length, number of spans, number of tracks and year built.
